description:
Situated on the second floor of a recently renovated Brownstone building, this apartment is well suited for anyone looking to be situated comfortably in a small building in the center of Manhattan, with easy access to all public transportation.

Modern and stylish comfortable furniture, high ceilings, large full kitchen, large living room, bathroom and bedroom overlooking quiet backyard garden.

Full kitchen, lots of closets

I live in the building

Midtown Manhattan, close to all the theaters, clubs, and many restaurants. A couple of blocks from Time Square, close to Lincoln Center, Central Park and West Side bike and walking path.

Lots of transportation options: subway, buses and ferries

This apartment is rented for a maximum of to adults
name: Large one-bedroom in of Manhattan mid-town west
review: Great location, amazing huge apartment and very friendly and helpful host! Very much recommended.
